items.title: DIKSHA consumption dataset
items.description:
Generic consumption dataset that aggregates data from across various DIKSHA consumption channels, different types of content on the platform, as well as tags it to additional content metadata that is available. This dataset is generated daily for all consumption on the platform.

It can be used to answer questions such as:

  • What is the most popular content on Diksha (which language, board etc)
  • What types of content are most used?
  • How much time do users spend on an average on different types of content?
  • What is the usage split across App and Portal? etc.
